description:
When Fuyuki`s mom accidentally buys him boxers instead of briefs, he finds himself agonizing over which one he`d rather be wearing.  Then Galulu shows up, and... it looks like he`s going to confess his feelings to Pururu?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuyuki, Trunks versus Briefs / Garuru, Obscured Feelings!?
冬樹 トランクス対ブリーフ / ガルル 密かなる想い!?
